message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I've priced it at $20,000, reflecting its value and the benefit it will bring you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value of the product. However, I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. How about $14,000?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet halfway at $17,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the current market conditions and my budget constraints, how about $16,000?
